description: This file defines a React functional component called NoteCard, which displays individual notes with their title, content, last updated date, and options to edit or delete the note.

methods.name: NoteCard({ note, onEdit, onDelete })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a note card with title, content, last update, and action buttons.
